name: Tower of Power (ZbamGames)
description:
Tower Of Power

You can check out my other games too -> Seniorb, ZipZip

How to play?

Use mouse to control plane, your goal is to collect power crystal from the generator on the middle of the map and charge 8 towers around generator,once you charged all towers,you can get out of map and win.

Controls:

Left Click -> Shoot Rocket

Middle Click -> Speed Boost

Right Click -> Look Behind

Story

You stole an airplane.But special forces went on to you.When you were trying to escape from them,you got stuck in a dimension.To escape dimension,you must activate all 8 towers around the spawner on the middle.Generator generates power crystal at random times.To activate towers,You must charge airplane from generator's power crystal and pass thru towers to discharge.
When you activate all towers, power shiled will deactivate and you can escape.
You can respawn as long as generator  is alive.If generator blow up,  you will stuck there and  lose the game.
